# Functions Docs

## Functions

- [Functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/index.md): Learn more about: Functions (Visual Basic)
- [Conversion Functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/conversion-functions.md): Learn more about: Conversion functions (Visual Basic)
- [Math Functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/math-functions.md): Learn more about: Math Functions (Visual Basic)
- [String Functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/string-functions.md): Learn more about: String Functions (Visual Basic)
